component.description: Use the HTMLFlow component to display HTML content that should expand to its natural size without scrolling. The size of an HTMLFlow component is determined by its HTML contents, this component will draw at varying sizes if given content of varying size. When using HTMLFlow components within a Layout, consider what will happen if the HTMLFlow renders at various sizes. An HTMLFlow which can expand should be placed in a container where other components can render smaller, where the container is allowed to scroll, or where there is padding to expand into.
